name: Medieval Mayhem (itch) (Epic Tortoise Studios)
description:
A Ludum Dare 45 submission. 

Theme = Start with Nothing.

Medieval Mayhem is a first person beat em up/brawler set in the medieval times. The player will encounter skeletons and two headed dogs as they search the area for weapons to save their lives.

During this project we had a few set backs with the entire team having enough time to contribute.
